concept.title: 204.7107 CONTRACT ACCOUNTING CLASSIFICATION REFERENCE NUMBER (ACRN) AND AGENCY ACCOUNTING IDENTIFIER (AAI).

conbody.p: Traceability of funds from accounting systems to contract actions is accomplished using ACRNs and AAIs. Follow the procedures at PGI 204.7107 for use of ACRNs and AAIs.
